title: SosSpagetti
author: SosSpagetti
created_time: August 30, 2023, 06:28:14 AMLast edit: October 31, 2023, 05:26:18 PM by SosSpagetti
content: We are looking for a person who will be able to advertise projects on Twitter and Reddit. But also Telegram, Reddit, Quora, CMC, Gap, Discord).You have to:- have at least 3-6 different Twitter / Reddit accounts, ( for the rest SM 3 accounts)- know how to avoid the Twitter shadowban, we want your comments to be visible,- have experience in shilling/advertising, - for other SMs also at least 3 different accounts,- be able to work 4 hours a day,-use a VPN,- perfect English.For more information write DM on my telegram https://t.me/maxmerissIf we like your work, you can work with us for a long time.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: SosSpagetti on August 30, 2023, 06:28:14 AMWe are looking for a person who will be able to advertise projects on Twitter. But also Telegram, Reddit, Quora, CMC, Gap, Discord).You have to:- have at least 3-6 different Twitter accounts,- know how to avoid the Twitter shadowban, we want your comments to be visible,- have experience in shilling/advertising, - for other SMs also at least 3 different accounts,- be able to work 4 hours a day,-use a VPN,- perfect English.For more information write DM on my telegram https://t.me/maxmerissIf we like your work, you can work with us for a long time.What is the rate per hour and what will be the payment method? If I work for you then you will pay upfront or use escrow or do you want to pay after the end of the task? Would highly appreciate it if you response on the topic and/or added these on the topic instead of saying Please pm me on telegram.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: SosSpagetti on August 30, 2023, 06:28:14 AM- have at least 3-6 different Twitter / Reddit accounts, ( for the rest SM 3 accounts)Is it that one applicant should have at least 3-6 different accounts on Reddit and Twitter?, or having 3-6 different accounts on Reddit or Twitter?

comments.author: SosSpagetti
comments.body: One person need to have 3 different accounts for Telegram, Reddit, Quora, CMC, Gap, Discord.For twitter at least 3 - the best 6.The more accounts you have, the more work we can offer.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: SosSpagetti on October 31, 2023, 05:59:14 PMOne person need to have 3 different accounts for Telegram, Reddit, Quora, CMC, Gap, Discord.For twitter at least 3 - the best 6.The more accounts you have, the more work we can offer.Active management of 6 or 10 SM accounts requires full-time. What is the payment rate? You can certainly say "from-to" or at least payment per account.Also, you should say something more about legality, since you emphasize the potential avoidance of the shadow ban. Is everything legal and does the whole business require some kind of spam on SM?

comments.author: irfan_pak10
comments.body: Quote from: SosSpagetti on October 31, 2023, 05:59:14 PMOne person need to have 3 different accounts for Telegram, Reddit, Quora, CMC, Gap, Discord.For twitter at least 3 - the best 6.The more accounts you have, the more work we can offer.I have a community here https://t.me/OfficialbountyportalI can activate them if the task and payments are up to the mark. Have people who are experienced in marketing at twitter, reddit, quora, and 4chan. Let me know the task details and how many people are required and payment details.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Basically, what you need is a shiller across social media paltforms, it is mandatory for a shiller to have multiple accounts because bans are imminent, the idea of 3-6 or even more accounts isn't new as shillers already are cool with it, one shiller can't work across all these social media platforms and achieve much within the 4 hour time frame and it will come at a high cost if the shiller has to work with his team. If you need a team ready to go on the job, I can avail my finest to get the job done. Considering the demand, I'd say 2-3 shillers will be needed. What are you offering as payrate per hour?

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: This work seems to be a serious advertising gig so can you tell us how much you're going to pay the people that's going accept the offer? If I'm not busy with my irl work, I would've go for this although I don't have any experience doing ads on these social media sites but I'm quick to learn when it comes to stuff like this.

comments.author: SosSpagetti
comments.body: We have a lot of applications, I sent you a DM. I will provide all details about the job in a private message.
